value.0:
CS Rest: Bedroll In Use
Place a container object as per the instructions in the CS Resting documentation and put an instance of this item in the container to cause the CS Resting subsystem to take bedrolls into account when calculating hit point regain. You must set the tag of *this* item to the tag of the item that is to be considered as a bedroll, i.e. if you have a bedroll item with a tag of "BEDROLL", then you must also set the tag of *this* item to "BEDROLL".

One of the world's rarest and most coveted gems, alexandrite takes on a brilliant green hue when under indirect sunlight but turns blood-red when exposed to candlelight. Loretellers claim that all alexandrite comes from the body of the oldest son of Silvanus, the Forest Father. A common nursery rhyme goes "Silvanus' wife went mad one night, murdering her child by candlelight."
